featured.text: Whenever I set foot on the soil of Rwanda, a country in east-central Africa, I feel as if I have entered paradise: green hills, red earth, sparkling rivers and mountain lakes.
But 29 , Rwanda is a symbol of the triumph of the human spirit over evil.
Though it was once known to the world for the 1994 tribal conflict that resulted in about one million deaths, Rwanda has 30 the mass killing.

definition.zh_def: 盧旺達，位於非洲中東部的國家，以其山地和湖泊而聞名。
definition.en_def: Rwanda, a country located in East-Central Africa, known for its mountainous terrain and numerous lakes.
definition.example: Rwanda is often referred to as the 'Land of a Thousand Hills' due to its scenic landscapes.
